divs: sighting details 10\25\07 was looking for holmes. saw am extremely bright star, 3\4 way up from horizon, to the north.(i'm in ne, tenn). it strobed continuosly, white, red, blue. next night, it's out there, same place and appearance. next night, 27th, watching it, it appeared to move in a 90* angle, i sighted a star to confirm this. it went up to the star(a short distance), and i said, that thing moved! it then sailed off to the south east, until it was out of sight. it strobed continuosly, and had a strange smoothness in it's passage. hard to explain. afterwards, i took note of the jets in the sky to ascertain it was not a jet, it was not, jets seem cloddish compared to the "moving star", and also jet lights blink on and off, and the lights are way dimmer. i spotted it the next night, but it was stationed farther away, and to the northwest. it was nothing from this place, this technology. i figured they existed(ufo's) but never expected to see one. i'm convinced now. it is a confirmed reality to me, albeit a strange and wonderful one.
Summary: looked like very bright star until i saw it move.
